articles.author: Science X staff
articles.title: Study challenges theories of earlier human arrival in Americas - Phys.org
articles.description: A new analysis of archaeological sites in the Americas challenges relatively new theories that the earliest human inhabitants of North America arrived before the migration of people from Asia across the Bering Strait.
